remarks: The reverse isomorphism H of a 1-dim subspace is an atom.  (Contributed by NM, 28-Apr-2014.)
statement:
dihlatat.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
dihlatat.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
dihlatat.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
dihlatat.i $e |- I = ( ( DIsoH ` K ) ` W ) $.
dihlatat.l $e |- L = ( LSAtoms ` U ) $.
dihlatat $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ Q e. L ) -> ( `' I ` Q ) e. A ) $.
